results.name: Triangle T read by rows: coefficients of polynomials generating array A099597.
comment: Row sums are k (A000027), left edge columns are factorials (A000142). [_Peter Bala_, Aug 19 2013]
formula: The row polynomials satisfy the second order recurrence equation R(n,x) = (n*x+1)*R(n-1,x-1) - (n-1)*(x-1)*R(n-2,x-2), with the initial conditions R(0,x) = 1 and R(1,x) = 1+x. - _Peter Bala_, Aug 19 2013
maple: # Define row polynomials R(n, x) recursively:
R := proc(n, x) option remember; if n = 0 then 1 elif n = 1 then 1+x
mathematica: Table[CoefficientList[R[n, x], x], {n, 0, 8}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 13 2019 *)
